snippet: Peruvian police officers fired tear gas at hundreds of students and civil servants in Lima on Thursday as they marched toward Congress.
abstract: Peruvian police officers fire tear gas at hundreds of students and civil servants in Lima as they march toward Congress; demonstrators are protesting changes that would impose tougher standards on universities and government workers.
lead_paragraph: Peruvian police officers fired tear gas at hundreds of students and civil servants in Lima on Thursday as they marched toward Congress.

headline.main: Peru: Police Fire Tear Gas on Students
headline.print_headline: Peru: Police Fire Tear Gas on Students
